title: The Forgotten Hall
intro: You awake in a dimly lit room. Dust hangs in the air, and the musty smell of old stone fills your nose. A faint breeze comes from the north.

chamber.title: Chamber
chamber.description: You are in a small chamber. The walls are made of cold, gray stone, and the floor is covered in dust. There is a door to the north, and an old wooden chest sits in the corner.

actions.name: search
actions.result: You see only dust and old stone. The chest looks like it hasn't been opened in ages.

actions.name: open chest
actions.result: The chest is empty, but it smells faintly of wood and age.

actions.name: go north
actions.result: You go north into the library

library.title: Library
library.description: You step through the door and find yourself in a room lined with shelves, but most of the books are long rotted. A single tome rests on a pedestal in the center of the room. Its cover is intricately carved, but itâ€™s difficult to read the title.

actions.name: examine tome
actions.result: You open the tome, and a hidden passage opens behind the bookshelf.

actions.name: go south
actions.result: You go south into the chamber

actions.name: go passage
actions.result: You walk through the hidden passage and escape the mansion. Well done!
